Sentencas: In this study, the performance of an SOFC (solid oxide fuel cell) and an MCFC (molten carbonate fuel cell) combined system is analyzed.
Titulo: Investigating the performance of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell combined system

Sentencas: Because SOFCs cannot completely use their fuel, the remaining fuel must be handled effectively.
Titulo: Investigating the performance of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell combined system

Sentencas: In general, MCFCs can be run at the high operating temperatures required for SOFCs; therefore, the exhaust gas from an SOFC, which still contains useful fuel, can be directly fed into an MCFC.
Titulo: Investigating the performance of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell combined system

Sentencas: The effects of key operating conditions, such as temperature and fuel utilization, on the system performance are investigated.
Titulo: Investigating the performance of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell combined system

Sentencas: A simulation of this combined fuel cell system shows an electrical efficiency of 55.22%, which is higher than a single SOFC.
Titulo: Investigating the performance of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell combined system

Sentencas: The efficiency of the combined fuel cell system can be further improved by adjusting operating conditions.
Titulo: Investigating the performance of a solid oxide fuel cell and a molten carbonate fuel cell combined system
